lead_paragraph: Michael Curry, with one year of experience as an assistant, will be the Detroit Pistons’ coach next season, the team’s president, Joe Dumars, said. Curry was an assistant last season in Detroit under Flip Saunders, who was fired last week. Curry agreed to a three-year deal.
